about_the_game:
The Bighead Runner: Original Soundtrack is a collection of 5 awesome original tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) plus a trailer song from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!

  • Banjo3
  • Hyperbolic Dimension
  • Pizza has Arrived
  • Dufus
  • Autostumbler
  • Impressive what you can do with the right mushrooms
  • Banjo3 (looped)
  • Hyperbolic Dimension (looped)
  • Dufus (looped)
  • Autostumbler (looped)
  • Impressive what you can do with the right mushrooms (looped)

You can access the musics on the folder "//steamapps\common\Bighead Runner
detailed_description:
Wishlist Burning Skies


About the Game

The Bighead Runner: Original Soundtrack is a collection of 5 awesome original tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) plus a trailer song from the great brazilian composer Derek Volker!

You can access the musics on the folder "//steamapps\common\Bighead Runner
